name: Gaya Game Prototype
description:
An early prototype for a game about political consolidation in ancient Korea's Gaya Confederacy. 
Currently in a very minimal state.

Controls
-Spacebar loads a new round (with randomized governors and province incomes)
-Escape quits

Directions
- Governors need opinions of you above certain levels before they allow you to intrude on their authority by making buildings in their land.
- Improve their opinions by gifting them luxury goods.
- Trade your wealth for luxury goods to gift them at your capital.
